Texts.Chs: 由于在周边体系中过于迅速和过于广泛的传播，使他们的经济受到压力，直到达到不可避免的崩溃点。 甲虫人从一开始就对金钱不感兴趣(他们对于利用现有资源获取短期利益的要求太高了，部分原因是他们作为一个物种的自然进化) ，他们甚至没有意识到问题的存在，直到为时已晚。
Texts.Eng: Having spread too rapidly and too far among the neighboring systems stressed their economy until it reached an inevitable breaking point. The Mantizi, never great with money in the first place (they are far too hard-coded to use current resources for short-term gain, due in part to their natural evolution as a species), were not even aware of a problem until it was too late.

Texts.Chs: 不是他们的军费开支，不是他们的科学实验，也不是他们天生不讨人喜欢的本性，让甲虫人失去了他们的经验力量。不，完全是别的东西导致了他们曾经伟大的文明的衰落。可以说，扩张主义把他们推向了死亡的边缘。
Texts.Eng: It wasn't their military spending, their scientific experiments or their inherently unlikable natures that cost the Mantizi their empirical might. No, it was something else entirely that contributed to the downfall of their once great civilization. Expansionism brought them to the death-knell, as it were.

Texts.Chs: 曼蒂奇历史: 帝国的衰落
Texts.Eng: Mantizi History: The Fall of an Empire

Texts.Chs: 只有时间才能证明他们是否能再次建立一个持久的帝国，团结各个部落。 如果他们能够再次建立一个可行的政府，他们将会在英大地守护团受到欢迎。
Texts.Eng: Only time will tell if they can once again forge a lasting empire and unite the tribes. They would be welcome voices in the Protectorate, should they once again create a viable government.

Texts.Chs: 市民们试图取代政府，但是已经造成了太多的破坏。这个帝国实际上已不复存在。 据估计，在他们的领土范围内，死亡人数为4245167211人。
Texts.Eng: The citizens attempted to replace the government, but too much damage had already been done. The empire, as it was, ceased to exist. The estimated death tally across their entire territory is 4,245,167,211.

Texts.Chs: 我们不能忽视他们的天生战斗力。尽管帝国已不再是一个强国，但由于沃格斯 · 西格纳信条仍被视为“核心”美德甲虫人称之为“为了所有人的利益而强制学习”的一种花哨说法) ，古老的学习方式仍然很受欢迎，并在大多数人民中得到了很好的实践。
Texts.Eng: We cannot neglect to mention their natural combat abilities. Despite the empire no longer being a power, the old ways remain popular and are well practiced among the majority of their people due to the Vorgeth Cygna Doctrine still being held as a 'core' Virtue (a fancy way of Mantizi saying 'mandatory learning for the good of all').

Texts.Chs: 现在剩下的是许多部落。他们固守着自己的世界，尽管他们过着奢侈生活的倾向丝毫没有减弱。据最新统计，剩下的甲虫人星球仍然有超过650亿个人居住。其中，32%是工匠或艺术家，7%是哲学家，8%在妓院或类似行业工作。显然，曼蒂奇喜欢表达。
Texts.Eng: What remains now are numerous tribes. They cling to individual worlds, though their tendency to live lives of excess has not diminished in the least. At last count, the remaining Mantizi worlds still house over 65 billion individuals. Of that population, 32% are Artisans or Artists, 7% are philosophers, 8% work in brothels or similar professions. Clearly Mantizi enjoy expression.

Texts.Chs: 不到二十年，帝国的金库空空如也。工人们再也拿不到工资，失业率迅速达到87% 以上(官方解散或废除时间统计局估计为87.72%)。 随之而来的是一场大规模的内战，以及对参议院每一个成员的彻底屠杀。即使是先知也被杀死，他们的内脏被用作腰带。
Texts.Eng: Within twenty years, the coffers of the empire were empty. Workers could no longer be paid, and the unemployment rate rapidly reached over 87% (estimated 87.72% at the official time of dissolution). What followed was a massive civil war, and the complete slaughter of every single member of the senate. Even the Oracles were slain, their entrails used as sashes.
